mapper.select: select from PS_TZ_CERTTMPL_TBL where TZ_JG_ID= #{tzJgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TZ_CERT_TMPL_ID=#{tzCertTmpl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from PS_TZ_CERTTMPL_TBL where TZ_JG_ID= #{tzJgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TZ_CERT_TMPL_ID=#{tzCertTmpl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update PS_TZ_CERTTMPL_TBL
TZ_DESCR100 = #{tzDescr100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZ_APPCLS_NAME = #{tzAppclsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZ_APPCLS_PATH = #{tzAppclsPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZ_APPCLS_METHOD = #{tzAppclsMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROW_ADDED_DTTM = #{rowAddedDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ROW_ADDED_OPRID = #{rowAddedOprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROW_LASTMANT_DTTM = #{rowLastmantDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ROW_LASTMANT_OPRID = #{rowLastmantOprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNCID = #{syncid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYNCDTTM = #{syncdttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TZ_JG_ID= #{tzJgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TZ_CERT_TMPL_ID=#{tzCertTmpl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PS_TZ_APPCLS_TBL set TZ_DESCR100 = #{tzDescr100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TZ_APPCLS_NAME = #{tzAppclsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TZ_APPCLS_PATH = #{tzAppclsPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TZ_APPCLS_METHOD = #{tzAppclsMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROW_ADDED_DTTM = #{rowAddedDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ROW_ADDED_OPRID = #{rowAddedOprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROW_LASTMANT_DTTM = #{rowLastmantDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ROW_LASTMANT_OPRID = #{rowLastmantOprid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNCID = #{syncid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYNCDTTM = #{syncdttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TZ_APPCLS_ID = #{tzAppclsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
